metadata.title: CVE-2022-47942 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in ksmbd in the Linux kernel 5.15 through 5.19before 5.19.2. There is a heap-based buffer overflow in set_ntacl_dacl,related to use of SMB2_QUERY_INFO_HE after a malformed SMB2_SET_INFO_HEcommand.

criterions.comment: linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
